title: Split Excel Sheets into Files
description: Upload an Excel file and export each sheet as a separate .xlsx file.
author: Qun

title: Merge PDFs into One
description: Combine multiple PDF files into a single document in your browser.
author: Qun

title: Local Music Player
description: Import and play your local songs directly in the browser—no app required. Supports background playback, loop modes, shuffle, volume control, multilingual UI, and persistent local library.
author: Qun

title: Image to PDF or PDF to Image
description: Free & Secure Image to PDF Converter. Process files locally in your browser—no uploads required. Supports A4/A5 layouts, custom margins, and batch extraction. Fast, private, and easy to use.
author: Qun

title: 英语精读笔记工具/English Reading Tool
description: 这款工具为您提供纯净的精读环境，支持导入文章，一键划词归档生词与金句，并可随时添加深度笔记。阅读结束后，系统将自动生成排版精美的 PDF 复习讲义，是英语学习者打造个人知识库的绝佳工具。
author: Qun
